title: PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is an open-source relational database management system known for its robustness and standards compliance, offering advanced features such as complex data types, advanced queries, and ACID transactions.

items.title: PostgreSQL Tutorial
items.description: Learn PostgreSQL quickly through a practical PostgreSQL tutorial designed for database administrators and application developers.

items.title: PostgreSQL - W3schools
items.description: In this tutorial you get a step by step guide on how to install and create a PostgreSQL database. You will learn how to create a project where you can create, read, update, and delete data.
